instructions.d1: Hello, and welcome to Rune Search! I am Goat.
instructions.d3: I love to eat letters! Use the < and > keys to help me find them. (I can't see very well...)
instructions.d4: Whenever I am not eating something I get pretty cranky... Don't let my Hunger level reach 10!
instructions.d5: If YOU need to go eat something, press 'p' to pause the game.
